00020 
00021 // Specification of our base class
00022 class FunctionLib{
00023         public:
00024                 FunctionLib();                                                  
00025                 virtual ~FunctionLib();                                 
00026                 
00027                 virtual double mapValue(double x) = 0;  
00028                 // double lookupValue(double x);                ///< map x to y using lookup table
00029                 virtual JamomaError setParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00030                 {       return JAMOMA_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER; }
00031                 virtual JamomaError getParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00032                 { 
00033                         // We do this here to ensure that any calling function won't actually free
00034                         // random memory
00035                         *argc = 0; *argv = NULL;
00036                         return JAMOMA_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00037                 }
00038                 virtual JamomaError getFunctionParameters(long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00039                 {
00040                         *argc = 0; *argv = NULL;
00041                         return JAMOMA_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00042                 }
00043 };
00044 
00045 
00046 JamomaError     jamoma_getFunction(t_symbol *functionName, FunctionLib **function);
00047 void            jamoma_getFunctionList(long *numFunctions, t_symbol ***functionNames);
00048 
00049 
00050 double          jamoma_anti_denormal(double value);
00051 
00052 #endif // __FUNCTIONLIB_H__
